title: BRIEF-Wärtsilä Signs Extension To Its Operation And Maintenance Agreement With PhilGold Processing And Refining Corporation
text:
BRIEF-Wärtsilä Signs Extension To Its Operation And Maintenance Agreement With PhilGold Processing And Refining Corporation

Stock Markets 14 minutes ago (Sep 30, 2019 18:40)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Wärtsilä Signs Extension To Its Operation And Maintenance Agreement With PhilGold Processing And Refining Corporation Sept 30 (Reuters) - Wartsila Oyj Abp :

* HAS SIGNED A FOUR-YEAR EXTENSION TO ITS OPERATION AND

MAINTENANCE (O&M) AGREEMENT WITH PHILGOLD PROCESSING AND

REFINING CORPORATION (PGPRC)

* EXTENSION TO AGREEMENT WAS PLACED WITH WÄRTSILÄ IN JUNE

2019



Source text for Eikon: ID:nNDL9wQDls

Further company coverage: WRT1V.HE



(Gdynia Newsroom)



BRIEF-Wärtsilä Signs Extension To Its Operation And Maintenance Agreement With PhilGold Processing And Refining Corporation
